sale price.translation[0].definitions[0]: the price at which something is offered for sale
He declined to estimate the sale price or how long it might take to sell the division.
sale price.translation[0].definitions[1]: the price for which something is actually sold
The investor’s return is the difference between the purchase price and the sale price of the bonds.
sale price.translation[0].definitions[2]: the price of something sold in a SALE (=a period of time when a seller offers goods or services at prices that are lower than usual)
The fare cuts are substantial, but the sale prices may still strike some customers as high.
sale price.translation[0].definitions[3]: the price of something sold in an AUCTION (=public meeting where something is sold to the person who offers the most money for them)
This was a record for a baseball card, with a sale price of $451,000 at Sotheby’s.
